vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_15.sol#33-39):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)()) (patch_15.sol#36)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_15.sol#37)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_15.sol#25-31):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_15.sol#28)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_15.sol#29)
